summary: This module offers utility helpers for integrating NVIDIA's Transformer Engine into the Accelerate framework, including mechanisms to detect Transformer Engine layers, perform FP8 autocasting, wrap models for FP8 support, and provide a simple forward pass abstraction. Although defined, these utilities are presently unused within the codebase.
business_intent: Enable developers to leverage FP8 mixed‑precision training and Transformer Engine optimizations for faster, more efficient large‑scale transformer model training within the Accelerate ecosystem.
